comment.author: Mason
comment.text: No kidding, some of these pot holes are so bad. You hit one and need a front end alignment. Where's the money? We have the worst roads.

replies.author: Presley
replies.text: The money? Well, its gone to so called women and children refugees, I mean future Democrats. So they can live the American dream while the rest of us live a nightmare.
